statements: DELETE FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 101 AND name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 1000);
DELETE FROM Customer WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Purchase WHERE total_amount < 100)
DELETE FROM Address WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Purchase)
DELETE FROM orders WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM customers c WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM orders o WHERE c.customer_id = o.customer_id AND o.total_amount < 100);
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 123456 AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
DELETE FROM Addresses WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
